import React from 'react'; function Shipping() { return (

Shipping Rates & Policies

Everything you need to know about SkyCart shipping

Shipping Options

🚚 Standard Shipping

Cost: ₹199 (Free on orders over ₹1500)

Delivery: 5-7 business days

Our most popular shipping option for everyday purchases.

⚡ Express Shipping

Cost: ₹399

Delivery: 2-3 business days

Get your items faster with our express shipping option.

🌟 Overnight Shipping

Cost: ₹799

Delivery: Next business day

Need it tomorrow? Our overnight shipping has you covered.

Free Shipping

Enjoy free standard shipping on all orders over ₹1500. No minimum quantity required, and the discount is automatically applied at checkout.

  • ✅ No minimum quantity requirements
  • ✅ Automatically applied at checkout
  • ✅ Available to all destinations we ship to
  • ✅ No membership required

International Shipping

We ship to over 100 countries worldwide. International shipping rates and delivery times vary by destination.

📦 What We Ship

  • Most products in our catalog
  • Some restrictions apply for certain items
  • Electronics may have additional requirements

🌍 Delivery Times

  • Canada & Mexico: 7-14 business days
  • Europe: 10-21 business days
  • Asia-Pacific: 14-28 business days
  • Other regions: 14-35 business days

💰 Customs & Duties

  • Customer responsible for customs fees
  • Duties vary by country and product
  • We provide all necessary documentation

Order Processing

Orders are typically processed within 1-2 business days. During peak seasons, processing may take up to 3 business days.

Order Placed

You'll receive an order confirmation email immediately.

Processing

We prepare your items for shipment (1-2 business days).

Shipped

You'll receive tracking information via email.

Delivered

Your package arrives at your doorstep!

Tracking Your Order

Once your order ships, you'll receive a tracking number via email. You can also track your orders anytime by visiting the "Your Orders" section of your account.

); } export default Shipping;
